title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu: Matsuri (Dub)
alternative_title: Baka To Test To Shoukanjuu OVA, Baka To Test To Shokanju OVA, The Idiot, The Tests, And The Summoned Creatures OVA, Baka And Test: Summon The Beasts OVA, バカとテストと召喚獣 ～祭～
description: OVA of Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu which was announced to be released before the start of the second series.
